sentences.en: An assembler operation of conditional assembly and macro generation.
sentences.cn: 对条件汇编及宏生成的一种汇编操作.

sentences.en: Bristol Crown Court granted conditional bail with a surety of £2,500.
sentences.cn: 英国布里斯托尔刑事法庭准予有条件保释，保证金为2,500英镑。

sentences.en: It is shown that diffusion theory is a conditional approximation.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,漫射近似理论的成立是有条件的.

sentences.en: Motion is absolute while rest is temporary and conditional.
sentences.cn: 动是绝对的,静是暂时的,有条件的.

sentences.en: My agreement is conditional on your help.
One is to make all engine changes conditional on a version flag.
sentences.cn: 一种是引擎所有的改动都加上对版本号的条件判断.

sentences.en: She has been granted conditional bail.
The settlement of the issue must not be conditional upon the acceptance of fait accompli.
sentences.cn: 不能在造成既成事实的前提下解决这个问题.

sentences.en: Their agreement to buy our house was conditional on us leaving all the furniture in it.
sentences.cn: 他们同意买房子,条件是我们要把家具都留下来.

sentences.en: Their optimism is apt to be decidedly conditional and tremulous.
sentences.cn: 他们的乐观主义显然是有条件的而且是犹豫不定的.

sentences.en: Their success is conditional, I suggest, on this restriction.
sentences.cn: 我认为他们能否成功取决于这一限制因素.

sentences.en: There are two forms of most - favored - nation treatment: conditional and unconditional.
sentences.cn: 最惠国 待遇有两种形式: 有条件的和无条件的.

sentences.en: They are the basis of unconditional prophecies, as opposed to conditional scientific predictions.
sentences.cn: 它们是无条件预言的根据, 而不是有条件的科学预测.

sentences.en: This is the price system that place of conditional be mixed forms.
sentences.cn: 这就是条件交集所形成的价格体系.

sentences.en: Transient calls may be dropped during a conditional switchover.
sentences.cn: 在有条件的切换过程中,瞬时呼叫可能会掉线.

words.tran_cn: 有条件的，受制约的；习惯于…的
使适应（condition的过去分词）；以…为条件
使适应；使健康；决定；以…为条件

phrases.tran_cn: 在……条件下；视……而定；取决于
附条件承诺；有条件承付汇票

trans.tran_en: if an offer, agreement etc is conditional, it will only be done if something else happens first
a sentence or  clause  that is expressed in a conditional form
